Html:
Hi,

currently i'm experiencing some strange problems with your ribbon control:

i can't press any buttons! All buttons are enabled but i cant press them, ribbon is not responding at all (click/mouse over). It is very "floating" problem because this problem can disappear on the next applicatio start or maybe not.

I've spent a lot of time by trying to find problem, but no results...

Any ideas?

 

Thanks in advance!

More details - ribbon is unavailable only when application window is created as inactive. If i'm already have any active window in my system when my application starts - everything works great, otherwise ribbon doesnt work. Any ideas?
I get the same problem when I change the container form RTL at runtime.
